creator: jdc@nextjet.com
text:
would like the available task to be able to check the existence of files inside
a jar/zip file (currently would have to explode it)

creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
text:
The available task is already able to do this:
  <target name="injar">
    <available property="check.exists"
               resource="checkstyletask.properties"
               classpath="${user.home}/apps/checkstyle-3.1/checkstyle-all-3.1.jar"/>
    <echo>check.exists is ${check.exists}</echo>
  </target>
